summary: A brief email from Lesley Groff to an unspecified recipient, relaying a message that Jeffrey Epstein would like to speak with them and providing instructions to call a number where she will connect the call. The document is marked as subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Sends an email on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein, asking the recipient to call so she can connect them to Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The person who wants to speak with the email recipient, as relayed by his assistant Lesley Groff.

connections.description: Groff is acting as Epstein's assistant, relaying his request to speak with a third party and offering to connect the call.

events.title: Epstein communication request
events.description: Lesley Groff emails an unspecified recipient to inform them that Jeffrey Epstein would like to speak with them and provides contact instructions.

keyFacts: An email from Lesley Groff shows Jeffrey Epstein was actively seeking communication with an individual in October 2012.
The document is explicitly marked as subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
Lesley Groff acted as an intermediary, offering to connect a call to Epstein, indicating her role in managing his communications.
